name: ASTRONOPE
description:
✨ASTRONOPE✨ is a co-op + competitive game.

2 players control the same astronaut 👩‍🚀 who can't decide between going to the Earth or the Moon.

P1 moves ⬆️⬇️and wants to reach 🌍

P2 moves ⬅️➡️and wants to reach 🌛

Players need each other to reach their goal, so it’s competitive co-op! 💕

There’s also only 1 player character, so it’s single-player multiplayer! 💕
